data.text:
About US

OUR STORY

Logitail was founded in 2017. That was one year after Oracle acquired NetSuite and expressed its ambition to expand into the European market. Logitail has over 80 years combined consultancy experience.

At Logitail, we believe that NetSuite will disrupt the mid-market ERP landscape. We want to help customers in shaping and growing their organizations and we believe that NetSuite is the most future-oriented way to go.

Logitail is a Benelux NetSuite Solution provider and an EMEA Certified SuiteCommerce partner that offers a range of services and solutions to businesses looking to implement or enhance their e-commerce operations. Choosing Logitail as your NetSuite SuiteCommerce partner can bring several benefits, including:

Expertise: Logitail has extensive experience and expertise in NetSuite SuiteCommerce, and can provide businesses with the guidance and support they need to make the most of their investment in the platform.

Customization: Logitail can help businesses tailor their online store to meet their unique needs, including customizing the look and feel, adding new features and functionalities, and integrating with other systems and tools.

Scalability: Logitail can help businesses scale their e-commerce operations as they grow, ensuring that their platform is able to keep pace with changing demands and requirements.

Integration: Logitail can help businesses integrate their NetSuite SuiteCommerce platform with other systems and tools, including payment processing, shipping, marketing automation, and more, to streamline their operations and reduce manual data entry.

Ongoing support: Logitail provides ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure that businesses get the most out of their NetSuite SuiteCommerce investment, and can resolve any issues quickly and effectively.

Cost-effective: Working with Logitail can help businesses save time and reduce costs associated with implementing and maintaining their NetSuite SuiteCommerce platform, allowing them to focus on growing their business.

Overall, choosing Logitail as your NetSuite SuiteCommerce partner can provide a range of benefits that can help businesses achieve their e-commerce goals and succeed in the digital age.

k

Assesment

Logitail collaborates with the company to comprehend their business needs and evaluate the optimal approach for implementing NetSuite in order to fulfill those requirements.



Configuration

Logitail sets up the NetSuite system in accordance with the unique needs of the company, which involves configuring modules, custom fields, and workflows.



Datamigration

Logitail assists the company with the migration of their current data to the NetSuite system, guaranteeing the precision and currency of all data.



Testing

Logitail performs comprehensive testing on the NetSuite system to verify its proper functionality and alignment with the organization’s specifications.



Training

Logitail delivers training to the users of the organization, enabling them to develop a sound understanding of the NetSuite system and employ it proficiently.



Support

Subsequent to the implementation, Logitail offers continuous support to assist the company in ensuring the uninterrupted operation of their NetSuite system, while also accommodating their evolving requirements.



CRONOS GROUP

Logitail is part of the Cronos Group, a large international IT integrator, with headquarters in Belgium. Logitail benefits from the advantages of a large group, access to a vast pool of IT resources, expertise in a wide range of technologies, and financial strength, whilst at the same time enjoying the agility of a software company dedicated to NetSuite.

Fearless Leaeders

Our Management team is committed to leading the company to achieve its mission and to identify new strategies and long-term plans to satisfy and anticipate our customer’s needs.

They foster a respect for the company’s core values and ensure that each employee evolves in a positive work environment conducive to self-fulfillment.

Menno Verbon

Manager

Gert Van Damme

Manager

Let’s Start Something new

Say Hello!

Would you like to know more about NetSuite or request a demo? We are happy to tell you more. Feel free to contact us for all the details and a personalized demo.
